00013 template <typename T>
00014 class DataInstanceWriter {
00015 public:
00016         typedef typename topic_data_writer<T>::type DW;
00017 
00018 public:
00019   DataInstanceWriter(boost::shared_ptr<DW> writer, const T& key) {
00020     pimpl_.reset(new ::dds::peer::DataInstanceWriterImpl<T>(writer, key));
00021   }
00022   DataInstanceWriter() { }
00023 
00024   virtual ~DataInstanceWriter() { }
00025 public:
00031   dds::ReturnCode_t write(const T& data) {
00032         return pimpl_->write(data);
00033       }
00034 
00041       dds::ReturnCode_t write(const T& sample, const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) {
00042         return pimpl_->write(sample, timestamp);
00043       }
00044 
00045       dds::ReturnCode_t unregister() {
00046         return pimpl_->unregister();
00047       }
00048 
00049       dds::ReturnCode_t unregister(const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) {
00050         return pimpl_->unregister(timestamp);
00051       }
00052 
00053       dds::ReturnCode_t dispose() {
00054         return pimpl_->dispose();
00055       }
00056 
00057       dds::ReturnCode_t dispose(const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) {
00058         return pimpl_->dispose(timestamp);
00059       }
00060 
00061       dds::ReturnCode_t
00062       wait_for_acks(const DDS::Duration_t& timeout) {
00063         return pimpl_->wait_for_acks(timeout);
00064       }
00065 
00066 private:
00067   ::boost::shared_ptr<dds::peer::DataInstanceWriterImpl<T> > pimpl_;
